import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { return (

About

I'm a senior at Georgia Institute of Technology pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics and Computational Data Analysis with a 3.96 CGPA. Currently working as an Undergraduate Research Assistant at the Financial Services Lab, where I construct global monetary policy networks and simulate FX market dynamics using advanced graph techniques.

My research focuses on the intersection of AI, mathematics, and finance. I've published at NeurIPS 2024 with the SubjECTive-QA dataset and am currently working on comprehensive surveys of financial NLP applications. As an Honors Teaching Assistant, I conduct biweekly sessions teaching differential equations and multivariable calculus to 50+ students.

Previously, I worked as a Quantitative Researcher at Prabhudas Liladhar, where I developed advanced statistical models for mutual fund analysis and generated novel trading strategies with machine learning, achieving 13.5% alpha. My work spans from mathematical modeling to practical algorithmic trading implementations.

Education Georgia Tech • Applied Mathematics & Computational Data Analysis
Research Focus Financial AI • NLP • Quantitative Finance • Graph Networks
Publications NeurIPS 2024 • NAACL (Under Review) • IJCRT
Technical Skills Python • PyTorch • QuantLib • Backtrader • SQL • MATLAB
Languages & Certifications English • French • Hindi • Karate Black Belt • PADI Divemaster

Recent Awards

  • President's Undergraduate Research Award
  • College of Sciences Award
  • Student Government Award
); }; export default About;
